attributes.action: enforce legislation that bicycle riders should compulsorarily wear helmets when riding their bicyles.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Too many serious injuries and fatalities occur due to the fact that those riding bicycles do not wear a cycle helmet. Please make this law - it is currently only reccommended and really should be compulsory to ensure everyone's safety on the road.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
